section.title: Manage bare metal nodes
section.para: If you use the bare metal driver, you must create a bare metal node and add a network interface to it. You then launch an instance from a bare metal image. You can list and delete bare metal nodes. When you delete a node, any associated network interfaces are removed. You can list and remove network interfaces that are associated with a bare metal node.

listitem.para: Adds a network interface to a bare metal node.
